name: Tipo de atencion más realizado por mes
query:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(subquery.mes, '-', subquery.tipo) AS "mes-tipo",
    MAX(subquery.cantidad) AS cantidad
FROM (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.egreso, '%%Y-%%m')
        END AS mes,
        a.tipo,
        COUNT(*) AS cantidad
    FROM 
        tabAtencion AS a
    JOIN 
        tabAnimal AS an ON a.parent = an.name
    GROUP BY 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.egreso, '%%Y-%%m')
        END,
        a.tipo
) AS subquery
GROUP BY 
    subquery.mes
ORDER BY 
    subquery.mes ASC;
report_name: Tipo de atencion más realizado por mes
